title: Dillian Whyte stunned by Alexander Povetkin as WBC world-title shot disappears
description: Dillian Whyte's hopes of a world-title shot are wrecked as Alexander Povetkin lands a stunning knockout win.

description: Drew Adams, a US trans man, has won a court battle against his school to use the male bathrooms.

title: Christchurch mosque attacks: 'I'm close to forgiving, but not there yet'
description: The wife of a man killed in the Christchurch attacks is preparing to attend the gunman's sentencing.

title: Beirut blast: Painstakingly restored stained glass destroyed in seconds

title: Arsenal Women out of Champions League after late PSG winner

description: WHO chief Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus says "we have the technology to stop it".

title: Twitch: The streamers furious at Burger King
